tool_description: Calculates next maintenance due dates and mileages based on completed services and maintenance rules.

service_type.description: Type of maintenance service to calculate interval for

last_service_date.description: Date of last service of this type

last_service_mileage.description: Mileage when last service was performed

error_messages: Invalid service intervals: Both miles and months intervals must be positive.
Invalid mileage data: Current mileage must be greater than or equal to last service mileage.
Invalid date: Last service date cannot be in the future.
Invalid average miles: Monthly average must be positive.
Calculation error: Unable to determine next service date due to inconsistent data.
usage: Provide last service details and current vehicle status to calculate when the next service of this type is due based on both time and mileage intervals.

next_due_mileage.description: Mileage when next service will be due

days_until_due.description: Number of days until service is due

miles_until_due.description: Miles remaining until service is due

due_trigger.description: Whether service will be due by date or mileage first (time, mileage, or both)
